experience: You and Adam both know Matt Greene, Luke Hohmann, and 57 others
Leading the development of GoDaddy's next generation website building platform.  Focused on a simple to use, mobile first platform that scales to millions of users in data centers around the world.

•	Successfully lead the development of GoDaddy's next generation Website Builder.  Focusing on a mobile first experience, performance on UI, App, and API tiers and multi-data center deployments.•	Successfully lead teams in the day to day operations of 5+ products hosting millions of websites around the world.•	Drove the successful adoption of a fully automated CI/CD stack across the division increasing the number of deployments from 4-5 per week to 10-15 per day while maintaining consistent quality.•	Reduced the time to setup and deploy new services from multiple weeks to less than one day simplifying the adoption of a micro-service architecture.

•	Lead the Website Builder product development for the Presence and Commerce group.•	Successfully lead the team through a tech-stack transition from Microsoft C# and RDBMS to a NodeJS based system using Cassandra as a data store.•	Changed the product direction from a single data center non-redundant system to a system that scales across multiple data centers in an Active / Active configuration serving millions of users.•	Successfully brought a next generation hosting design from prototype to production in less than 6 months.  The new design is capable of handling 10 times the load of the previous system, with 1/5 of the server capacity and 1/10 the time to first byte.

•	Lead the Corporate and IT Support teams responsible for operations center systems, domain and legal case management applications, company communications and help center systems, company intranet, HRMS, and financial systems.•	Lead the team responsible for claim management process automation.  Claims are brought by external and internal customers relating to Spam, Abuse, Trademark Disputes, Copyright Claims, Domain Transfer Disputes, and Fraud Detection.  Led the effort to incorporate Social Media Influencers, Alexa Rankings and other external indicators reducing the likelihood of taking a major site offline.•	Led the implementation of company-wide single sign on (SSO) using SAML and ADFS allowing us to integrate with on premise and SaaS based solutions with ease (team open source contributions to SimpleSAMLPhp).•	Conceived and led the implementation of a load balancer change request automation system that abstracted out vendor specific commands and fully automated cluster and server rotation changes.  The system manages 700+ clusters, and over 3500 servers, it led to a 90% decrease in incidents created by deployments and dramatically reduced the amount of time needed for changes to be processed from hours to less than 1 minute. (C#, Perl, ASP.NET, Windows Services, Web Services, Cisco CSM, Cisco ACE, BigIP F5, A10)•	Created a service account management system that creates and tracks all system service accounts.   This automated the process of creating, maintaining, and rotating system service accounts within the company.  Allowing the company for the first time to change out all service account username and passwords on a regular basis. (AD, C#, SQL Server, Web Services)

•	Led the effort to make all online help content available to websites in an embedded fashion.  This reduced the amount of time it takes for customers to set up their products. (C#, JavaScript Template Engine, ASP.NET, RSA and AES cryptography)•	Created a system responsible for managing all database and web service credentials across all GoDaddy systems. •	Created and led a project to automate the installation of 10000+ SSL Certificates on 1000+ servers.  Reduced the amount of time needed to install a certificate from +5 minutes to less than 1 second per machine.  Integrated with Active Directory to ensure that Service Accounts that needed access to certificates were automatically granted access during installation.•	Created system to remotely track and audit company laptops to ensure that the systems are secure.  Reducing the amount of time needed to track / audit company assets.  Developed secure remote update system to allow the company to remotely update laptops in a secure fashion.
